column4: In flash videos, is sound being off with the video a documented problem?
maybe nolimitsoya is right about flash9 now in the repos. If not, I followed the directions here: http://dschneller.blogspot.com/2006/10/flash-9-beta-in-ubuntu-dapper.html
nolimitsoya: it *does* appear that the backports for dapper include version 9. So I stand corrected. Sorry.
